content: **kits for notting hill are sold out if you would like to preorder a kit email me at info@thenoblethread com the pre-ordered kits will be ready to ship the first week of august ** notting hill is a quick simple sweater inspired by the london neighborhood of the same name it is knitted in a deliciously soft blend of merino alpaca and silk in a dk weight on a us 9 notting hill is entirely seamless knit top down so you can try it on as you go the short sleeves mean you will not be stuck on sleeve island the simple slip_stitch color yoke adds beauty and fun to the design some of my testers were first time sweater knitters and they found it a breeze this pattern is size inclusive with finished bust measurements ranging from 34 to 70 a note about the yarn if you wish to substitute another yarn i recommend you select a yarn with a similar blend in a dk weight or at least a blend of merino and silk or merino and alpaca both memory and drape are important to get a proper fit 1 https //www thenoblethread com/notting-hill
